name: Postruck
description:
Controls :

Hold Space Bar to aim further away.

Press (quickly) Space Bar to throw the Package

Release Space Bar to aim less far. 

Postruck is a one-button game as well as my first game, its a skill game in which you play as a postman who has to deliver packages while fulfilling some goals. It was created under several constraints such as simple graphics and make it alone.

There are 3 Levels :
- A tutorial, which is very important because this game has singular controls.

- The first level, which is fairly easy and introduces the Goal concept. You have to fulfill some objectives to get all the stars.

- The hard level, it's harder than the other levels because it's here to show what could be the game in advanced levels.
